title: Domain 4.6: Explain the importance of prohibited content/activity and privacy, licensing, and policy concepts.
content:
🚨 Incident Response

  • Chain of custody: 🧾 Track who accesses evidence and when to maintain its legal integrity.
  • Inform management/law enforcement: 🚔 Escalate serious breaches appropriately to internal or external authorities.
  • Copy of drive (data integrity): 💾 Create forensic copies—preserve original data untouched.
  • Documentation of incident: 📝 Log everything: actions, timestamps, personnel, and outcomes.

📄 Licensing / DRM / EULA

  • Valid licenses: ✅ Only use officially licensed software to stay compliant and secure.
  • Non-expired licenses: 🕒 Expired licenses may limit functionality or violate policy.
  • Personal vs. corporate use: 🧍‍♂️🏢 Ensure correct usage per license terms—personal licenses aren’t for business use.
  • Open-source licenses: 🔓 Free to use, but may require credit or code sharing depending on license type.

🧬 Regulated Data

  • Credit card transactions: 💳 Must comply with PCI-DSS for secure handling of payment info.
  • Government-issued info: 🪪 Protect items like SSNs and ID numbers from theft.
  • PII (Personally Identifiable Information): 🧑 Store and transmit securely to protect user privacy.
  • Healthcare data: 🏥 Subject to HIPAA—violations can result in heavy penalties.
  • Data retention: 🗄️ Follow laws and policies about how long to keep data—don’t delete too soon.
